mapper.insert: insert into product_t(pd_idx, ct_idx, pd_name, pd_price, pd_sale_price, pd_sale, pd_date, pd_cnt, pd_thumbnail_img, pd_detail_img, pd_last_update, pd_status) values(#{pd_idx}, #{ct_idx}, #{pd_name}, #{pd_price}, #{pd_sale_price}, #{pd_sale}, #{pd_date}, #{pd_cnt}, #{pd_thumbnail_img}, #{pd_detail_img}, #{pd_last_update}, #{pd_status))
mapper.update: update product_t set pd_idx = '${pd_idx}', ct_idx = '${ct_idx}', pd_name = '${pd_name}', pd_price = '${pd_price}', pd_sale_price = '${pd_sale_price}', pd_sale = '${pd_sale}', pd_date = '${pd_date}', pd_cnt = '${pd_cnt}', pd_thumbnail_img = '${pd_thumbnail_img}', pd_detail_img = '${pd_detail_img}', pd_last_update = '${pd_last_update}', pd_status = '${pd_status}' where pd_idx = #{pd_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @RN:=@RN+1 AS rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM product_t WHERE pd_status = 1 ORDER BY pd_idx ) a, (SELECT @RN:=0) b ) c WHERE c.rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
SELECT * FROM product_t WHERE pd_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pd_name}, '%')
